metadata.dc:author: Barraquer-Bordas, L
Vendrell-Brucet, J M
Sabido-Amatriain, F
Peña-Casanova, J
metadata.dc:description: The authors summed up the evolution of the current neuropsicolinguistics and of its origins. They proposed a general definition of the aphasic disorders in relation to the psycholinguists capacities involved. The paper finish with a brief reference to the variety of types of the aphasics disorders according with its fluent or non-fluent caracter.
metadata.dc:title: Introducción a la neuropsicolinguística.
[Introduction to neuropsycholinguistics].
